name: YubiOTPReader
summary: Simple class for reading One-Time-Passwords from NFC Yubikeys.
description:
For the easy scanning of One-Time-Passwords from NFC Yubikeys. You also have to add the NFC Capability and privacy string:

1. Add NFC Capability to your project
    1. Select your Project in the Navigator
    2. Choose your target
    3. Click "Signing & Capabilities"
    4. Click "+ Capability"
    5. Choose "Near Field Communication Tag Reading"
2. Set NFC Privacy string
    1. Open Info.plist
    2. Right click and choose "Add Row"
    3. Set new row's key to "Privacy - NFC Scan Usage Description"
    4. For Value, describe what your app will use NFC for

Then simply call scan.

let reader = YubiReader()
reader.scan() { otp in
    guard let otp = otp else { return }
    print(otp)
}
